name: Sleepless Night 2: Ladies’ Night(mare)
description:
Another "Sleepless Night"! However, this time you are going to spend the night at a friend's house where no boys are allowed. Natsumi, Midori, and Shizuka are having a Ladies' Night at Shizuka's house and you are invited. You can explore the whole house and collect clues. But don't get yourself killed! There are dangers lurking everywhere.

Credits:
Story, characters, music – Marcel Weyers
Character art – NoodleBrains
Backgrounds – OokamiKasumi
Additional graphics – Torsten Sohrmann
Beta testers – Sorakun, AntiquedFae, NeoAngelique
Engine – Ren'Py

German translation – Marcel Weyers
Dutch translation – Bob Reus (Visualnovels.nl)
Korean translation – hgdear
Italian translation – Armando "FL3R" Fiore

Specifications:
Title: Sleepless Night 2: Ladies' Night(mare)
Release: October 31, 2013
Genre: Horror/Psycho
Rated: 16+
Resolution: 1280×800
Platforms: Mac OS, Microsoft Windows, Linux
Endings: 24 (4 main endings + 20 death endings)
Languages: Dutch, English, German, Italian, Korean
